definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
unique and unmatched (idiom); unrivalled/nothing compares with it

sentences.english: When a young man reached 18 or 20 years old, the capping ceremony would be held.
sentences.chinese: 一個年輕的男人十八歲或二十歲時，要舉行冠禮。

sentences.english: The volatile substance contained a little of sesquiterpenes and diterpenoids.
sentences.chinese: 同時含有少量倍半萜和二萜類物質。

sentences.english: The fine structure parameters were calculated using a least-squares fitting procedure.
sentences.chinese: 用最小二乘法擬合技術嚴格地計算了精細結構參數。

sentences.english: Count data should not be treated they are dichotomous data.
sentences.chinese: 二分類數據不應作計數資料處理。

sentences.english: The judge stayed the sentence until the following day.
sentences.chinese: 法官把判決拖德溱二天才宣讀。

sentences.english: B A small rose-cut diamond or single-cut melee.
sentences.chinese: 二小玫瑰切割鑽石或單減混戰。

sentences.english: Two madams then air tiny Lin.
Use the battens of two by one inches and steel nails for nailing to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 由一個使用條板二移動和釘牢的鋼釘子對牆壁。

sentences.english: Difluorobiphenyl is the key intermediate for the synthesis of antipyretic analgesic Diflunisal.
sentences.chinese: 二氟聯苯是合成消炎鎮痛藥氟苯水楊酸的關鍵中間體。

sentences.english: The two pieces were indeed see money undoubtedly disfigured, believe her words.
sentences.chinese: 冢本見錢二的確被毀容無疑，相信了她的話。

sentences.english: Objective To study the features of stilbene glycoside's stability.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究二苯乙烯苷體外穩定性的特徵。

sentences.english: Non-Linear Least Squares were used to estimate the exponential time model.
sentences.chinese: 非線性最小二乘法用於估算指數時間模型。

sentences.english: Oh, sweetie, you are my second cousin's best friend.
sentences.chinese: 噢，甜心，你是我二堂姐最好的朋友。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the effects of Erjintang on analgesic effect and gastrointestinal motility.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討二金湯方的鎮痛作用和對胃腸運動的影響。

sentences.english: First Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University, Department of Respiratory Medicine, deputy director of the Second Ward.
sentences.chinese: 哈爾濱醫科大學附屬第一醫院呼吸內科二病房副主任。

sentences.english: The nitration of this may lead to dinitrotoluene.
sentences.chinese: 對此的硝化會生成二硝基甲苯。

definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
